en.answer: If <<13511>> is in face-down Defense Position when its effect resolves, the effect is not applied. (You do not reveal a Link Monster in your Extra Deck.)
en.question: During my Main Phase, I activate the effect of <<13511>> that reveals a Link Monster in my Extra Deck, and allows me to treat <<13511>> as having the same name, Type, and Attribute as that monster when used for a Link Summon this turn. If my opponent chains <<5432>> and changes <<13511>> to face-down Defense Position, how does its effect resolve?
